mapper.select: SELECT Q.QUESTION_SEQ -- 문의순번 , Q.CENTER_ID -- 센터ID , Q.PATIENT_ID -- 환자ID , P.PATIENT_NM -- 환자명 , Q.QUESTION_TYPE -- 문의유형 , CD.DETAIL_CD_NM AS QUESTION_TYPE_NM -- 문의유형명 , Q.QUESTION_CONTENT -- 문의내용 , Q.REG_DT -- 등록일시 , Q.REPLY_ID -- 답변자ID , U.USER_NM AS REPLY_NM -- 답변자명 , Q.REPLY_YN -- 답변여부 , Q.REPLY_CONTENT -- 답변내용 , Q.REPLY_DT -- 답변일시 FROM QNA Q INNER JOIN PATIENT P ON Q.PATIENT_ID = P.PATIENT_ID INNER JOIN COM_CD_DETAIL CD ON CD.COM_CD = 'CD009' AND CD.DETAIL_CD = Q.QUESTION_TYPE LEFT JOIN USER U ON Q.REPLY_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE QUESTION_SEQ = #{questionSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET REPLY_ID = NULL , REPLY_YN = 'N' , REPLY_CONTENT = NULL , REPLY_DT = NULL WHERE QUESTION_SEQ = #{questionSeq}
